content:
I’m an economist working with Data Science and Risk Analysis and currently living in the beautiful city of Florianópolis, Brazil. I’m an advanced user of the R language, Shiny Framework and an avid learner in the Machine Learning subject. Some of my hobbies include Science Fiction stuff, History, Racing and Aviation (I love to fly, both in real life or simulation).
I have professional experience in the educational, financial and public sector and more recently in a dedicated data science company, where we were responsible for creating incredible Artificial Intelligence based products and applications for big companies. I’m currently working as a Risk Analyst in the financial sector and deepening my knowledge in Risk, Compliance, Banking Regulation and Accountability.
  Download my resume.
summary: I’m an economist working with Data Science and Risk Analysis and currently living in the beautiful city of Florianópolis, Brazil. I’m an advanced user of the R language, Shiny Framework and an avid learner in the Machine Learning subject.
title: Vinícius Zendron

summary: Extends Leaflet for R by adding widget to control opacity of multiple layers.
title: leaflet.multiopacity

summary: This package provides some tools to validate and fix some errors when developing photogrammetry scenery to the new Microsoft Flight Simulator.
title: msfsSceneryTools
